price: ߏ߬ ߞߐ߫ ߒ ߓߘߊ߫ ߜߍߘߐ߫ ߝߐ ߞߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߸ ߞߊ߬ ߘߓߌ߬ߘߐ߬ ߝߐ ߞߍ߫ ߘߏ߲߰ ߘߐ߫ ߗߙߎ߫
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّيٓ أَعۡلَنتُ لَهُمۡ وَأَسۡرَرۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِسۡرَارٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: thumma innī aʿlantu lahum wa-asrartu lahum is'rāran
